Package io.atlasmap.service

Class AtlasService

java.lang.Object
io.atlasmap.service.BaseAtlasService
io.atlasmap.service.AtlasService
@Path("/") public class AtlasService extends BaseAtlasService
AtlasService, MappingService and DocumentService provide core backend REST services which is not specific to the individual data formats. MappingService handles mappings, DocumentService handles Documents (data sources in other words), and AtlasService handles the rest such as field action, library, ADM Digest file and ADM archive file.
